item.title: Flok: Collaborative Live Coding Platform
item.description: @plabarta_ and me helped to implement FoxDot on Flok, an amazing tool developed by munshkr which allows you to live code music and visuals online in a collaborative way. You can check the instructions on the official repository. Here is a short video demonstration of us using it with FoxDot and some hydra visuals.
